alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an acetamide group conjugated to a phenyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Acetanilides

alternative_parents.description: Acetamides where one or more amide hydrogens is substituted by an aryl group.
alternative_parents.name: N-acetylarylamines

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds contaning a phenoxy group.
alternative_parents.name: Phenoxy compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the sulfuric acid monoester functional group, with the generic structure ROS(O)(=O)=O, (R=organyl group).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfuric acid monoesters

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds with the general formula RNHC(=O)CH3, where R= organyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Acetamides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a secondary carboxylic acid amide functional group, with the general structure RC(=O)N(R')H (R,R'=alkyl, aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Secondary carboxylic acid amides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a potassium ion.
alternative_parents.name: Organic potassium salts

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carbonyl group, with the general structure RC(=O)R', where R=organyl, R'=H, N, O, organyl group or halide group.
alternative_parents.name: Carbonyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds with a positive electric charge.
alternative_parents.name: Organic cations

class.description: Organic compounds containing the sulfuric acid or a derivative thereof.
class.name: Organic sulfuric acids and derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as phenylsulfates. These are compounds containing a sulfuric acid group conjugated to a phenyl group.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing a sulfuric acid group conjugated to a phenyl group.
direct_parent.name: Phenylsulfates

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing a sulfate group that carries an aryl group through an ether group.
subclass.name: Arylsulfates

superclass.description: Compounds an organic acid or a derivative thereof.
superclass.name: Organic acids and derivatives
